snippet.title: ACE COMBAT ASSAULT HORIZON Legacy - N3DS - First Look!
snippet.description:
ACE COMBAT ASSAULT HORIZON LEGACY soars to the Nintendo 3DS platform with an intense 3D experience that delivers supersonic flying, exciting dogfights and high-altitude acrobatics.

ACe COMBAT ASSAULT HORIZON Legacy is scheduled for 2011 on Nintendo 3 DS.
Join the squad on http://www.facebook.com/acecombatofficial for ever burning news or check your local Namco Bandai Games website http://www.namcobandaigames.eu

Talk about this game, share tips & win goodies at http://www.namcobandaigames.eu/community
